content: . 14 The present study suggested that dronedarone and amiodarone had almost identical effects on preventing AF recurrence of atrial fibrillation after the blanking period. Our study suggested that the effectiveness of either drug in maintaining sinus rhythm was modest. Based on the follow-up, the rehospitalization rates for re-ablation between these two
query: long-term outcomes amiodarone beta-blockers atrial fibrillation follow-up recurrence maintenance therapy
title: Comparison of efficacy and safety between dronedarone and amiodarone used during the blind period in patients with atrial fibrillation after catheter ablation
authors: Yihan Li, Tong Hu, Mingjie Lin, Qinhong Wang, Wenqiang Han, Jingquan Zhong
reference: Li, Y., Hu, T., Lin, M., Wang, Q., Han, W., & Zhong, J. (2023). Comparison of efficacy and safety between dronedarone and amiodarone used during the blind period in patients with atrial fibrillation after catheter ablation.
